subject: Sarah
paragraph: Sarah had always been a diligent student. She made sure to prepare well for all her classes. Sarah dreaded the upcoming exam. Despite her anxiety, she studied harder. Eventually, she passed the exam with flying colors.

subject: The old car
sentence: The old car lacked air conditioning.
paragraph: The summers were unbearably hot. Everyone in the neighborhood upgraded their vehicles. The old car lacked air conditioning. But the old car remained a relic of the past. It stood in the driveway, barely touched.

subject: The twins
sentence: The twins resembled each other strikingly.
paragraph: From a distance, it was hard to tell them apart. Their parents often confused them. The twins resembled each other strikingly. Yet, they had distinct personalities. They made their own unique marks on the world.

subject: The child

subject: The villagers
sentence: The villagers feared the annual storm.
paragraph: Each year the storm brought devastation. Homes were lost and lives altered. The villagers feared the annual storm. Yet, they always rebuilt. Their resilience was commendable.

subject: The tourist

subject: The child
